subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Donaldson homered and had three R.B.I. for Toronto, and Chris Colabello extended his hitting streak to 18 games in an 11-3 rout.
snippet: Josh Donaldson homered and had three R.B.I. for Toronto, and Chris Colabello extended his hitting streak to 18 games in an 11-3 rout.
